channel.title: [Delta] Help
channel.description:
1. Does anyone know how to do this
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BsxNXPSDB58]Fixed delta combat - YouTube[/url]
Kingdomkey01 fixed it, but I can't seem to gain contact from him.
2. When I'm poisoned and my hp gets below 0 it will just reset my heath and not kill me.

item.title: [Delta] Help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:6, topic:437016”][quote author=Pblord7 link=topic=539732.msg3951107#msg3951107 date=1332285663]

If (hitpoints < 1)
deathstage ++
in process

would be the easiest way,

Tried that, didn’t work.
[/quote]

complicated could be like,
adding a boolean to the poisoning, if the player is poisoned set it true
then in process if (isposioned && healt < 1)
poisoned = false
deathstage = 2[/quote]
I already fixed it myself and I wasn’t that hard.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Help
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Pblord7, post:5, topic:437016”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=539732.msg3951098#msg3951098 date=1332285315]
If (hitpoints < 1)
deathstage ++
in process

would be the easiest way,
[/quote]
Tried that, didn’t work.[/quote]

complicated could be like,
adding a boolean to the poisoning, if the player is poisoned set it true
then in process if (isposioned && healt < 1)
poisoned = false
deathstage = 2

Read full topic
